database.name: VIEW C_INVOICETAX_CASHVAT_V
database.view: SELECT itcv.c_invoicetax_cashvat_id AS c_invoicetax_cashvat_v_id, fpd.ad_client_id, fpd.ad_org_id, fpd.created, fpd.createdby, fpd.updated, fpd.updatedby, fpd.isactive, fp.paymentdate, itcv.percentage, itcv.taxamt, itcv.taxbaseamt, fpsd.iscanceled, fp.fin_payment_id, fpd.fin_payment_detail_id, fp.isreceipt, fp.c_bpartner_id, fp.fin_paymentmethod_id, fp.status, fp.amount, fp.c_currency_id, itcv.c_invoicetax_id FROM c_invoicetax_cashvat itcv LEFT JOIN fin_payment_detail fpd ON fpd.fin_payment_detail_id = itcv.fin_payment_detail_id JOIN fin_payment fp ON fp.fin_payment_id = fpd.fin_payment_id LEFT JOIN fin_payment_scheduledetail fpsd ON fpd.fin_payment_detail_id = fpsd.fin_payment_detail_id
